content:
I have manually attempted the test_play_game cases of the tester and they work, yet when I try to run the test_ps2_student.py, I get a FAIL for all of them. I presume it is because when I call input(), the output skips a line in the console making it different from the predicted output in the tester file.

Is there anything I can do about this?
subject: Problem with input() and test_ps2_student.py

content: It’s hard to say what the exact problem here is without looking at the code, or the output error message that it shows. I could take a look at the error message, but if not, I’d recommend office hours
